nodes.title: Meat Puppets ‘Live Manchester, 2019’
nodes.content:
Meat Puppets ‘Live Manchester, 2019’ is now available in a 12” vinyl picture disc and in digital formats everywhere! Click the links below to grab yourself a copy.

https://music.amazon.in/albums/B09Z66DY18

https://digital-delivery-services.lnk.to/CBhs0bLBWE

nodes.title: New: Jack Swagger
nodes.content: DC-Jam signs The Soviet Machines front man, Jack Swagger to his debut self-titled album and it’s a thing of beauty.

nodes.title: 16 Hi-Fi Hits!
nodes.content: Bringing you the heat with a brand new 70’s themed vinyl compilation featuring tracks by Killing Joke, Fishbone, T.S.O.L., The Meat Puppets, JFA, Richie Ramone, Western Addiction, The Vandals, The Trend, #Goals, Painted Willie, The Soviet Machines, The Slow Faction, The Gain, The Rudy Schwartz Project, & Skoundrelz. Releasing early winter, 2022.

nodes.title: Meat Puppets – Live Manchester 2019

node.altText: meat puppets live album announcement poster

nodes.content:
We are very excited to announce the signing of the Meat Puppets for a new limited edition picture disc entitled ‘Live Manchester 2019’.


Shooting for a late fall/early winter release date. More details to follow soon!

nodes.title: Soviet Machines New Video Featured
nodes.content: The Soviet Machines new video “Get Your Kicks” has been featured on Consequence of Sound, one of the top music sites in the country. Proud of these guys and this brilliant album. ￼More big things on the way!

nodes.title: DC-Jam signs The Soviet Machines
nodes.content: DC-Jam Records is proud to announce the signing of Minneapolis based, Soviet Machines. New album drops early 2021.

node.altText: The Soviet Machines - The Soviet Machines
